author: Special Correspondent
text:
Two cases of chain snatching were reported in as many places in Thanjavur on Friday.

A motorcyclist snatched a gold chain worn by Gnanamani (63), wife of Shanmugham of Varagappaiyar Lane in Thanjavur, when she was walking along the South Main Street. The chain was weighing seven sovereigns. In another incident, another person entered the house of Vijayashanthi (24), wife of Vijayakumar of Ambedkar Nagar, Vallampudur, in Thanjavur district early on Friday morning and snatched away a gold chain weighing two sovereigns.
title: Two women robbed of chains
